author: Kan Ting Chiu J:
casename: Karuppiah Ravichandran v GDS Engineering Pte Ltd and Another
counsel: Kamala Dewi d/o Poologanathan and Seetha Lkshmi P S Krrishnan (Yeo Perumal Mohideen Law Corporation) for the applicant; Thomas Lei (Lawrence Chua & Partners) for the respondents
